app_about: Wodeu applies language processing algorithms on articles to highlight the most relevant content and add interactivity for language learners. Scroll through the menu and settings to discover it all!
desc_inspection: Tap on any Korean word to get more information, click on the sheet for in-depth information. Make sure to select the correct Text-to-Speech engine in the settings page!
desc_vocabulary_review:
Due today: #
Total Vocabulary: #

You can study bookmarked vocabulary with this flash card feature.
desc_reset_study_data: This action will reset your study data and can't be undone!
desc_lose_input: Close and lose the changes that have been made?
help_general:
Articles are colored based on their length and difficulty.

Purple: short reading
Green: medium reading
Red: long reading
help_vocabulary_review: This tool lets you review your bookmarked vocabulary.
help_verb_conjugator: This tool provides conjugated forms for verbs.
help_tts: TTS is provided by your device, you should be able to install additional voices in your device's settings page. Wodeu automatically uses the Korean voice of your selected engine, if available.
help_hangulize_romanize: This tool transforms Hangul and Roman letters.
help_hangul_guide: This is a basic guide on how to read Korean. More structured guides are planned!
help_stored_vocabulary:
This page displays your bookmarked vocabulary.

Definitions can change over time and are automatically synced with the server.
help_stored_articles: This page displays your bookmarked articles.
help_missing: This page does not provide a help text.
https_warning: The article source does not fully serve HTTPS content and won't be embedded here, you can open it in your primary browser instead.
restore_inapp_error: Could not restore previous purchases, please try again later.
error_inapp: Could not initialize In-App Purchases, please try again later.
error_permission_image: Could not upload image, please check if you have enabled the right permissions for this app.
error_no_internet:
No active internet connection or the server could be unreachable.

Please send a message to support@gimu.org if this problem persists.
error_no_tts: Text-to-Speech failed, you may have to install Korean voices onto your device or change the used engine in the settings page.
error_generic_verb_conjugator: Enter a Korean verb and submit to get the respective conjugations.
error_hangul_verb_conjugator: Input has no hangul characters, please enter a Korean word. English input and database is currently work in progress and will be available soon.
error_articles_bookmark: No stored articles found, you need to bookmark at least one article to use this feature.
error_vocabulary_bookmark: No stored vocabulary found, you need to bookmark at least one word to use this feature.
error_vocabulary_query: '#' could not be found in your bookmarks.
